Steps.Message: Update at 15:21 - Sorry if your power has gone off again today. We believed all power was restored but it seems there may be a bigger underlying issue. This is making our network weak and causing substation equipment to fault. We're arranging for our engineers to reattend and we will provide an estimated time frame for power to be back on as soon as possible.

We became aware of a power cut at 12:43. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Logs.Comment: Update at 15:21 - Sorry if your power has gone off again today. We believed all power was restored but it seems there may be a bigger underlying issue. This is making our network weak and causing substation equipment to fault. We're arranging for our engineers to reattend and we will provide an estimated time frame for power to be back on as soon as possible.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
